name: Marble Platformer 1.1
description:
This is a simple 3D platformer game. Move around using WASD and jump using SPACE. Collect all coins to win and try to enjoy.

Marble Platformer project made for game design course for Academy of arts in Novi sad.

Updates:

-Updated Lights

-Updated reset triggers

- Rotating platforms glow now

Music Downloaded from :

https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/trip-through-space/

Space Skybox downloaded from :

http://sortir.besancon.fr/event/nuit-des-etoiles
